title: Epiphyllum chrysocardium
text: Epiphyllum chrysocardium (syn.: Selenicereus chrysocardium) is an <a href="epiphytic">epiphytic</a> <a href="cactus">cactus</a> native to <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a>. It used to be the only species in the genus Chiapasophyllum or one of the species in the genus "<a href="Selenicereus">Selenicereus</a>", but molecular <a href="phylogenetic">phylogenetic</a> studies show that it belongs to "<a href="Epiphyllum">Epiphyllum</a>".
